text: The production will reportedly be directed by'Avenue Q'helmer Jason Moore. The musical version of Cher's life is coming to Broadway in 2018, the singer herself announced Tuesday. Cher tweeted, ` ` Just got off phone w / Writer & Director of musical. There will be performance in theatre with actors, dancers, singers. It'll be on Broadway 2018.''
